name: CANMAN
description:
Submission for MSPaint Jam 2021.

Fight against waves of enemies in an arena, collect money to upgrade your stats by punching the shop bells and hit the big one to call for the next battle. Keep it up until you reach the end.

Controls:
WASD - Move
Left Click - Attack

Music, main programming and design support by Fernando:
https://twitter.com/ferboid1
Art, original idea, design and programming support by Jorge:
https://twitter.com/TCLDrawings

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com
